Abducted on Air (2020) Perrey Reeves, Kim Shaw. Kidnapped and held captive, a TV news reporter stages a dramatic escape -- only to learn that she may still be in grave danger. (NR) 1 hr. 30 mins. Lifetime Sun. 2 p.m.
